europeana:record.dc:title: A new sponge Desmapsamma vervoorti spec. nov. (Poecilosclerida: Desmacididae) from Indonesia
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Soest, van R.W.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Porifera; Indonesia; new species; Desmapsamma.
europeana:record.dc:description: A new poecilosclerid sponge species Desmapsamma vervoorti spec. nov. is described from several Indonesian localities: Ambon, Jedan, Salayar, Komodo, Java, and Irian Jaya. The species was earlier reported from several Indo-Pacific localities as D. anchorata (Carter, 1882), a common Caribbean shallow water species. Comparison with Caribbean specimens makes it clear that Indo-Pacific specimens demonstrate small but consistent differences.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new sponge Desmapsamma vervoorti spec. nov. (Poecilosclerida: Desmacididae) from Indonesia (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 323) (Issue 33)
